

```{r}


 # Build query
request_url<- paste0( 'https://api.worldbank.org/pip/v1/pip?',
      'country=all',
      '&year=', "all",
      '&povline=', "2.15",
      'version=20220909_2017_01_02_PROD',
      '&fill_gaps=false',
      '&welfare_type=all',
      '&reporting_level=all',
      '&format=csv')

pip_main_vars_orig<- read.csv(request_url)

```

```{r}
write.csv(pip_main_vars_orig, "PhD_pages/data/original/pip_main_vars.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
